content: rosie the cosmic girl is truly out of this world from her cute little antennae to her space suit rosie is learning all about her earth friends and experiences with great curiosity rosie is an intermediate amigurumi crochet pattern written in us american terms the pattern includes detailed instructions in an easy to follow layout but a knowledge of basic crochet stitches and techniques used to make amigurumi is essential your gauge yarn thickness and hook size used will affect the size of your finished items my rosie is approx 20cm tall 8 inches
